bill.title: In employee rights, providing for right to participate in elections or referendums, for right to assemble with members of employee organizations, for rate of dues or initiation fees, for right to initiate legal actions, for disciplinary measures imposed on members of employee organizations, for election officers in employee organizations, for remedial measures for invalid elections, for duties of members and agents of employee organizations, for constitution and bylaws and reports and for penalties.
bill.description: An Act amending the act of July 23, 1970 (P.L.563, No.195), known as the Public Employe Relations Act, in employee rights, providing for right to participate in elections or referendums, for right to assemble with members of employee organizations, for rate of dues or initiation fees, for right to initiate legal actions, for disciplinary measures imposed on members of employee organizations, for election officers in employee organizations, for remedial measures for invalid elections, for duties of members and agents of employee organizations, for constitution and bylaws and reports and for penalties.
